datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Medico coordinador funcional de la OGITT

Oversee of all vaccine clinical trial activities: Pharmaceutical operations, clinical activities, good clinical practices, good documentation practices, adverse events and severe adverse events reporting, close coordination with country malaria control program and principal investigator, outreach activities, clinical trial monitoring, data monitoring and cleaning
CLINICAL DIRECTOR AT ANTICOVID-19 RESPONSE PROGRAM FOR EQUATORIAL GUINEA ENERGY COMPANIES

Planning an execution of Malaria Zero National Plan activities in the Peruvian Amazon: aggressively active surveillance, active surveillance, passive surveillance, and vector control activities, and planning of malaria training to the Peruvian Amazon health network

Oversee of all research protocols conducted in the Research Center. Medical Scientific liaison with Regional Directorate of Health and other research institutions conducting research in the Peruvian Amazon

datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Responsable de la evaluación y seguimiento clínico, y supervisor de las actividades de enrolamiento, retención, y de laboratorio para los estudios: 1) Un estudio multicentrico, doble ciego, randomizado, comparativo para evaluar la incidencia de hemolisis, seguridad, y eficacia de tafenoquina en sujetos con malaria por Plasmodium vivax; y 2) Un estudio de prueba de concepto, etiqueta abierta, para evaluar la eficacia, seguridad, tolerabilidad, y farmacocinetica de dosis unicas de DSM265.
